meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1696.

td.p: Bruce Gardner, a veterinarian from Cerritos, California
Janet Sargent, a medical billing manager from Croydon, Pennsylvania
Todd Lefkowitz, a physician from Scotsdale, Arizona (whose 3-day cash winnings total $28,200)

tr.td: AMERICAN HISTORY
TELEVISION
HOLIDAYS & OBSERVANCES
ART
FAMOUS WOMEN
HOMOPHONIC PAIRS
